src/stream/PatternSpotter.hpp

00002 //  PatternSpotter.h

00009 #ifndef edtw_PatternSpotter_h
00010 #define edtw_PatternSpotter_h
00011 
00012 #include "type_defs.h"
00013 #include "Subsequence.hpp"
00014 #include "basic_structs.hpp"
00015 
00016 //This is effectively an abstract class, but we can't put abstract classes
00017 //in STL structures, so we instead have a concrete class whose methods don't
00018 //do anything useful until overridden. A better solution would be to use
00019 //Boost classes that get around this or store pointers in the STL containers,
00020 //but doing this isn't a priority yet.
00021 // NOTE: additional fields MUST NOT be added in subclasses due to slicing
00022 class PatternSpotter {
00023 private:
00024         void er() const {
00025                 printf("ERROR: PatternSpotter: called abstract virtual function\n");
00026         };
00027         PatternSpotter& operator=(const PatternSpotter& other); // no copying
00028 
00029 protected:
00030         
00031         tick_t mTime; 
00032         
00033         // class label
00034         std::string mLabel;
00035         
00036 
00037         data_t* refData;        
00038         idx_t M;                        
00039 //      idx_t nDims;            
00040         
00041         // sequence attributes: minimum distance, start time, end time
00042         data_t dMin;            
00043         tick_t ts;                      
00044         tick_t te;                      
00045         
00048         long mDistCalls;
00049         
00051         bool mSameClassMeansOptimal;
00052         
00054         ReportCriteria mReportCriteria;
00055         
00058         virtual data_t normalize(data_t dist) const { er(); return kINVALID; };
00059         
00062         virtual data_t denormalize(data_t dist) const { er(); return kINVALID; };
00063         
00064 public:
00065         explicit PatternSpotter(Template const& ref, SpotterParams const& p);
00066         explicit PatternSpotter(const PatternSpotter& other);
00067 //      friend void swap(PatternSpotter& first, PatternSpotter& second);
00068         
00069         // -------------------------------
00070         // Virtual functions to be overridden
00071         // -------------------------------
00072         virtual ~PatternSpotter(); //virtual destructor because the internet said so
00073         
00074         // getters
00075         virtual unsigned long getDistCalls() const { return mDistCalls;};
00076         virtual data_t getCurrentDist() const { er(); return kINVALID; };
00077         virtual tick_t getCurrentStartTime() const { er(); return kINVALID; };
00078         virtual tick_t getCurrentEndTime() const { return mTime; }
00079         
00080         // getters using prefixes
00081         virtual data_t getBestCurrentDist()             const { return getCurrentDist(); };
00082         virtual tick_t getBestCurrentStartTime()const { return getCurrentStartTime(); };
00083         virtual tick_t getBestCurrentEndTime()  const { return getCurrentEndTime(); }
00084         virtual idx_t  getBestCurrentPrefix() const { return M-1; };
00085         
00086         // setters
00087         virtual void setMaxWarp(steps_t maxWarp) { er(); }
00088         virtual void setScaleFactor(double r) {}
00089         virtual void setMinScaling(double r)  {}
00090         virtual void setMaxScaling(double r)  {}
00091         virtual void setScalings(double rMin, double rMax) {}
00092         virtual void setMatchLenRange(length_t minLen, length_t maxLen) {}
00093         virtual void setQueryLenRange(length_t minLen, length_t maxLen) {}
00094         virtual void setUseScalingEnvelopes(bool useEnvelopes) {}
00095         
00096         // other public functions
00105         virtual void updateMatrix(const tick_t t, const data_t* sample, data_t cutoff) {
00106                 er(); };
00115         virtual bool sequenceLocallyOptimal(Subsequence seq) const {
00116                 er(); return false;};
00117         
00125         virtual void purgeAllOverlap(Subsequence seq) {
00126                 er(); };
00127         
00136         virtual void purgeInferiorOverlap(Subsequence seq) {
00137                 er(); };
00138         
00139         // -------------------------------
00140         // Non-virtual functions
00141         // -------------------------------
00142         
00143         //getters
00145         inline std::string getClassLabel() const { return mLabel; }
00146         
00148         inline idx_t getLength() const { return M; }
00149         
00150         //setters
00158         inline void setSameClassMeansOptimal(bool meansOptimal) {
00159                 mSameClassMeansOptimal = meansOptimal;
00160         }
00162         inline void setBestSubSequence(Subsequence seq) {
00163                 // remove indices that can't yield a better match
00164                 purgeInferiorOverlap(seq);
00165                 
00166                 dMin = denormalize(seq.dist);
00167                 ts = seq.ts;
00168                 te = seq.te;
00169         }
00170         
00173         inline void setReportCriteria(ReportCriteria criteria) {
00174                 mReportCriteria = criteria;
00175         }
00176 };
00177 
00178 PatternSpotter* createPatternSpotter(Template const& seq, SpotterParams const& p);
00179 
00180 #endif
